downloadTitle: Managing Large and Structured Meetings with Lync 2013
downloadDescription: Describes how to configure your Lync Server 2013 environment to host large and structured meetings.
detailsSection: This white paper describes how to configure your Lync Server 2013 environment to host and participate in large and structured meetings.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
systemRequirementsSection_supportedOS: Windows Server 2003 R2 Datacenter Edition (32-Bit x86)
Windows Server 2003 R2 Datacenter x64 Edition
Windows Server 2003 R2 Enterprise Edition (32-Bit x86)
Windows Server 2003 R2 Enterprise x64 Edition
Windows Server 2003 R2 Standard Edition (32-bit x86)
Windows Server 2003 R2 Standard x64 Edition
Windows Server 2008 R2 for Itanium-based Systems
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: managing Large and Structured Meetings with Lync 2010
